descripcion:
• We are looking for a Technical Development Manager who will be working directly with

    stakeholders (internal & external) focused on developing software solutions in various domains.

    You will help to develop and nurture a high-performing, self-managed development team based

    in our Tampa office. We're growing a team of A-player individuals that efficiently and

    consistently execute on delivering long-term customer value. Help us build a culture of

    leadership and high performance by fostering a safe psychological environment. You'll coach

    team members that are self-driven and consistently push themselves to grow.
